results.title: Bali II: paradise isle
results.brief_description: Bali II described as a “gem of the Dutch East Indies”. This travelogue concentrates on the traditions of Bali - its agriculture and markets, and cultural practices.
results.description: Bali II described as a “gem of the Dutch East Indies”. This travelogue concentrates on the traditions of Bali - its agriculture and markets, and cultural practices.
description_for_label: Bali II described as a “gem of the Dutch East Indies”. This travelogue concentrates on the traditions of Bali - its agriculture and markets, and cultural practices.
